textSub.name: para1
textSub.string:
Another bonus stage! These Angel Fish are moving really fast!
 Can you eat them all before time runs out? Use the Speed
 Boost bubbles to help you!

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string: HINT:\n Use the Speed Boost Bubble plus the Fish Dash ability\n (left mouse button) to chase down quick moving fish.
